vclaim: On Nov. 9, 2020, New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo said it was "bad news" that Pfizer had developed what appeared to be a successful COVID-19 vaccine, during U.S. President Donald Trump's tenure.
title: Did Gov. Cuomo Say It Was ‘Bad News’ Pfizer Vaccine Progress Came Under Trump?
subtitle: Republican lawmakers and right-leaning commentators seized upon remarks made by the New York Democrat during an interview on "Good Morning America."
author: Dan MacGuill
